message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counteroffer at $135. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Hi Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to go down to $125?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to save a bit more, but I'm not willing to go as low as $125. I'll meet you halfway from my previous counteroffer, so I'll counteroffer at $130. This is the lowest I'm willing to go. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. However, I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last counteroffer, so I'll counteroffer at $127.50. This is my final offer.
